text: Konagi lɔfelasiɛi ma, zalaɠa ɠula nui Yeɠoyada ɗa yiilɔɔ, é salaʋusu ungilagila kundiɠiiti toli: Yeloɠame ná-doun zunui Azalia, Yoɠanan ná-doun zunui Isemayɛle, Woɓɛde ná-doun zunui Azalia, Adaya ná-doun zunui Maaseya, naa ʋɛɛ Zikili ná-doun zunui Elisafate ʋa. É ti lolini, ti minazeɠegi ɠɛ yɔɠɔzu.
